name: All Twitch faces changed to ResidentSleeper
description: This is a style requested by Twitch broadcaster Oddler (the face of "ResidentSleeper") that changes every emote on his channel to the ResidentSleeper face. Be sure to watch Oddlers 72 hour Resident Evil marathon, starting on June 14th! twitch.tv/oddler

user.name: Total Cereal
user.about: Hi, and thank you for checking out my styles! My name is Total Cereal, and I am a longtime Twitch broadcaster of 4 years. If you like my styles, I'd also love to see you around at my channel, twitch.tv/total_cereal.
